summary:
Stops Mjoll repeating all her history.
Stretches her commentary out to a more bearable level.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod.

V1.0
I love this follower! BUT -
I got sick of the constant yapping every step of the way! 
I looked everywhere for a mod to tone it down....
I made most of her historical comments once only!
And the rest stretched from 0.50hrs to 9.50hrs for reset.
Its been nice and peaceful. 
I have Mjoll facelift mod as well. I found I had too uninstall and reinstall it. Apart from that. It seems too work ok!! :~) 

V1.1
I tweaked it a little to push the reset timers further out.
Its been so peaceful. I think I\'ll leave it there.
Enjoy!
author: Nord1974
